column4: Hey, I've got a question regarding nvidia drivers. I'm following this guide: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=57368     on step (b) I can't seem to find my kernel. It's supposed to be 2.6.20-15-386 but the only package there is linux-source and linux-source-2.6.20
you can also go to /usr/src to verify
